divs: sighting detailsbetween 9:00-9:45 sept 29,2011 we were driving north on i-69 and there was a major accident that had traffic backed up for miles. we slowly made it to the uniontown exit and took a right. the interstate was shut down forcing everyone to exit. once at the top of the overpass you could see tons of emergency vehicles just north of the exit tending to an accident. the traffic was all funneling towards hwy 31 to the left, so we took a right to avoid the mess. our route put us onto comisky pike which dumps back into 31n. we joined the masses of detoured traffic back on 31n and right at kriete corner neat the national wildlife refuge a bright white light went from our 5 o'clock to 12 o'clock positions. it came from behind us and my wife and i were both surprised by it. clearly was not a plane, it was moving too fast, not a comet as it had no tail or trail behind it, too big\bright to be a shooting star. we then made it up to seymour entrance to i69 north and got on our way. just a couple minutes after we were on the interstate 3-5 lights appeared out of nowhere to the east of the interstate. they were there for about 10 seconds, converged and disappeared. there was no noise, no flash- nothing, they were just gone. now we are a bit weirded out. it was the same brightness and consistency of the light that shot over us just a few minutes earlier. third encounter was just a few minutes after this cluster of lights. this time they were to the west of the interstate and a grouping of 3-5 solid lights were in a pretty straight line. they all appeared and vanished at the same time. i am aware that there is a national guard post north of where this happened, but the guard usually plays on the weekends, and this was on a thursday night and we were 34 miles south of where the post is. i've mapped everything out and tried to debunk this, but it was very odd. if the first sighting of the night was the only one, i would have chalked it up to being a meteor, but 3 sightings in 30 minutes was too strange.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Seymour
There were no other sightings in Seymour on or around September 29th 2011
Summary: 3 sightings of weird lights within 30 minutes of eachother along I -69
